title: Crosshair overlay
selftext:
Basicaly i got 2 screens and my main screen is kinda wide. this results in my focus on engagement being in the wrong spot (about 3-4 cm away from the centre of the screen to the left) . 

my questions are, is there a way to have a crosshair ingame if not is there a non restricted way for me to get it there . by non restricted i mean allowed by facepunch.
